ing: 1/2 (8 ounce) bottle zesty Italian-style salad dressing
des: "Everyone has these ingredients on hand when wanting a nice refreshing salad that is tasty, quick, and easy. Cubed roma tomatoes can also be added to this recipe; it's good either way. Serve as a side dish, afternoon snack, or midnight munchies."
ins:
Combine cucumbers, red onion, bell pepper, and celery in a large bowl; season with sea salt and black pepper. Pour dressing over cucumber mixture.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 1 hour.
